links.title: World Health Organization (WHO)
links.description: Twitter and YouTube API feeds for WHO, and their RSS feeds

links.title: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
links.description: Twitter and YouTube API feeds for CDC, and their RSS feeds for pulling information

links.title: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)
links.description: Twitter and YouTube API feeds for ECDC, and their RSS feeds for pulling information

links.title: The COVID Tracking Project
links.description: The COVID Tracking Project collects information from 50 US states, the District of Columbia, and 5 other US territories to provide the most comprehensive testing data we can collect for the novel coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2.

links.title: Coronavirus COVID19 API (covid19api.com)
links.description: An API for current cases and more information about COVID-19

links.title: COVID19-Tracker-REST API
links.description: An API for current cases and more information about COVID-19

links.title: NovelCOVID API
links.description: An API for current cases and more information about COVID-19

links.title: COVID-19 API (nubentos.com)
links.description: The COVID-19 API provides information related with the case of pneumonia associated with the COVID-19 coronavirus

links.title: Coronavirus Data API (thevirustracker.com)
links.description: Provides global stats, country stats, full timeline, and country timeline for the coronavirus

links.title: Health API - COVID-19 (health-api.com)
links.description: Global Coronavirus statistics by country and state.

links.title: Coronavirus Smartable (smartable.ai)
links.description: The coronavirus stats and news API offers latest and historic COVID-19 stats and news information per country or state

links.title: New South Wales Coronavirus Cases
links.description: New South Wales Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) cases

links.title: COVID-19 Finnhub API
links.description: Get real-time updates on the number of COVID-19 (Corona virus) cases in the US with a state-by-state breakdown. Data is sourced from CDC and reputable sources.

links.title: COVID-19 Elsevier Research API
links.description: A research dataset search engine API (indexing datasets from 60+ scientific data repositories worldwide).

links.title: COVID19-India API
links.description: A volunteer-driven API for COVID-19 stats & patient tracing in India (Unofficial).

links.title: Covid India API
links.description: REST API to track Coronavirus cases in India on state level.

links.title: COVID-19 Statistics API
links.description: Based on public data by Johns Hopkins CSSE

links.title: COVID19 -India- API(By Adhikansh Mittal)
links.description: The data is used from the official website of the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare of India.[official website]

links.title: Chile Corona API
links.description: API to obtain data about coronavirus infections (COVID-19) in Chile.

links.title: COVID19 India Data API
links.description: COVID19India API provides you with the details of the Country Cases and the State Cases as per the data updated in the MyGOV website.

links.title: Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 API
links.description: This is an API for the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) Statistics. Source of data for this API is Johns Hopkins University Center for Systems Science and Engineering (JHU CSSE) Github Repository.

links.title: COVID-19 India Cases API
links.description: COVID-19 India cases - statewise (source - Ministry Of Health and Family Welfare, India).

links.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) Outbreak API for Developers
links.description: Provides confirmed cases by country and region, province and state, from CDC, ECDC, WHO, Wikipedia and NOVELCovid.

links.title: Librairy API
links.description: An open web service to identify drugs mentioned in a text and classify them according to the Anatomical Therapeutic Chemical (ATC) classification system and the Concept Unique Identifiers (CUI) described in the Unified Medical Language System (UMLS).

links.title: COVID-19 Nigeria API
links.description: Based on public data from Nigeria Centre for Disease Control.

links.title: UK Coronavirus Data API
links.description: A live COVID-19 data scraper API provide function with history, and confirmed cases geolocation.

links.title: COVID-19 Japan Web API
links.description: Web API to get COVID-19(coronavirus) information of each prefecture in Japan.

links.title: COVID-19 testing locations in Australia
links.description: A single collection with a request for a list of coronavirus testing locations in Australia.

links.title: US Energy Information Administration
links.description: EIA API accesses open data for energy sources and consumption in the US.

links.title: ncov19.us API
links.description: News, Twitter, county, and statistics for COVID-19 aroundn the world.

links.title: COVID-19 India Tracker
links.description: This API gives you the latest COVID-19 State wise and District wise data in India. This API is very simple to use and create awesome Portal.

links.title: Infection Alert System
links.description: Provides a personal risk score and international and multi-level suspicious contact tracking without sending any personal data to the servers.

links.title: COVID-19 API with Machine Learning Prediction
links.description: The COVID-19 statistics collected from multiple sources and provided as an easy to use API. The data is then processed by Machine Learning algorithms to build disease spread prediction that is updated daily based on the recent data.

links.title: Coronavirus (COVID19) Tracker
links.description: This Free API tracks actual Coronavirus (COVID-19) information about tested and infected people in multiple countries.

links.title: API & GRAPHQL COVID-19
links.description: Access data on COVID19 through an easy API for free. Build dashboards, mobile apps or integrate in to other applications. Data is sourced from Johns Hopkins CSSE.

links.title: COVID-19 Rich Data Services
links.description: Given the critical need for timely access to high quality data around COVID-19, MTNA is making our Rich Data Service platform publicly and freely available for the publication of primary and contextual COVID-19 related data, to support researchers, data analysts, developers, and public users.

links.title: COVID-19 Global Tracker
links.description: This free API exposes all available regional data housed on Wikipedia. This collections serves data for these use-cases: Realtime global counts; total cases, recovered & deceased, Realtime counts across countries; total cases, recovered & deceased, Weekly (historical) data counts; total cases, recovered & deceased, Drill-down of regional data for a country by states, provinces, other.

links.title: Canadian COVID-19 API
links.description: This is the API service for the COVID-19 Tracker Canada project. The goal is to provide fast access to the dataset maintained by the COVID-19 Tracker Canada team.

links.title: Coronatracker API
links.description: CORONATRACKER.com is a community-based project powered by over 460 volunteers from across the globe, ranging from data scientists, medical professionals, UI/UX designers, fullstack developers, to the general public.

links.title: ECDC World Wide Cases
links.description: The downloadable data file is updated daily and contains the latest available public data on COVID-19. Public-use data files allows users to manipulate the data in a format appropriate for their analyses. Users of ECDC public-use data files must comply with data use restrictions to ensure that the information will be used solely for statistical analysis or reporting purposes.

links.title: Covidti API
links.description: We want to provide a reliable and accurate API of coronavirus data. The data source are John Hopkins CSSE data for World and US and Wikipedia data for the US with county level cases Information. This API includes county level time-series for the U.S. and country level time-series for the World.

links.title: COVID-19 REST & GraphQL API
links.description: Access data on COVID19 through an easy API for free. Build dashboards, mobile apps or integrate in to other applications. Data is sourced from Johns Hopkins CSSE.

links.title: Curated COVID-19 Data and Metadata
links.description: The COVID-19 Rich Data Services API from MTNA offers curated, high-quality data and metadata from statistics and contextual datasets from around the world. The catalog is updated daily and constantly growing.

links.title: Curated COVID-19 Data and Metadata
links.description: The COVID-19 Rich Data Services API from MTNA offers curated, high-quality data and metadata from statistics and contextual datasets from around the world. The catalog is updated daily and constantly growing.

links.title: Canadian COVID-19 API
links.description: This is the API service for the COVID-19 Tracker Canada project. The goal is to provide fast access to the dataset maintained by the COVID-19 Tracker Canada team.

links.title: Coronatracker API
links.description: CORONATRACKER.com is a community-based project powered by over 460 volunteers from across the globe, ranging from data scientists, medical professionals, UI/UX designers, fullstack developers, to the general public.

links.title: ECDC World Wide Cases
links.description: The downloadable data file is updated daily and contains the latest available public data on COVID-19. Public-use data files allows users to manipulate the data in a format appropriate for their analyses. Users of ECDC public-use data files must comply with data use restrictions to ensure that the information will be used solely for statistical analysis or reporting purposes.

links.title: CDC Cases & Deaths (ScrAPI)
links.description: Scraping the COVID-19 cases and deaths from the CDC home page, converting the data to JSON, and saving it within an environment

links.title: CDC Testing (ScrAPI)
links.description: Scraping the number of specimens tested for SARS CoV-2 by CDC labs and U.S. public health laboratories from the CDC website

links.title: US Digital Registry API
links.description: An API for pulling federal government agencies and social media accounts

links.title: News API
links.description: An aggregate news API for pulling news from across multiple news sources

links.title: COVID-19 Twitter Searches
links.description: Twitter API search, with a handful of the common search COVID-19 search terms.

links.title: Twitter Accounts for State Government in 50 US States
links.description: State government Twitter accounts for all 50 states in the United States

links.title: Twitter Accounts for State Governors in 50 US States
links.description: State governor Twitter accounts for all 50 states in the United States

links.title: Twitter Accounts for State Health Departments in 50 US States
links.description: State health department Twitter accounts for all 50 states in the United States

links.title: County Health Departments for All 50 US States
links.description: A single collection with a request for each of the 50 states, pulling a listing of name, website, address, phone, email, twitter, and facebook for all county health departments

links.title: Twitter Accounts for County Health Departments in all 50 US States
links.description: The Twitter accounts for over 300 county health departments across 50 US States

links.title: Department of Veteran Affairs (VA)
links.description: A Veteran-centered API platform for securely accessing Veteran Affairs data.
